snippet: Shares of Sprint Nextel slipped by nearly 5 percent on Tuesday after Deutsche Telekom announced that it was in talks to buy MetroPCS and merge it with its American subsidiary, T-Mobile USA.
abstract: Shares of Sprint Nextel slipped by nearly 5 percent on Tuesday after Deutsche Telekom announced that it was in talks to buy MetroPCS and merge it with its American subsidiary, T-Mobile USA.

headline.main: As MetroPCS Talks Deal, Sprint Sinks
